title: The Unexpected You
description: Eighteen-year-old Alice Anderson seems to have it all—she's rich, she lives in one of the best apartments in New York City, her two best friends and her cool mom adore her, and she is frustratingly gorgeous. Alice is the epitome of perfect. But what she never tells people are the following: she resents her dad, she doesn't have a clue what she wants to do after graduation, she's had an embarrassing number of crushes but was too coward to act on any of them.But the most deadly secret of all—is that she works as a companion escort.And when it's time for Alice to meet her next client, she has no idea—that her world is about to turn upside down. Why? Because her fourth client turns out to be her new high school teacher, Nick Chase.
author: Emily N. Kay
